location: Port of Spain, Trinidad and Tobago
description: I'm a man who is loyal, fun, outgoing, loving, caring I believe in true family values I have a good sense of humor and I love children. I am healthy, responsible, polite, understanding I am not afraid of commitment, my attentions attracts not the appearance but the actions of a woman, I am not a rich man but I am hardworking.I'm romantic,loves traveling and loves to compliment a woman when it is due,I'm supportive to my soul mate in good and bad moments my heart is generous and it has much love to feed a woman's body mind and soul,am a dreamer of positive things,I love nature,having nice conversations and have a good positive attitude to life and love. I believe in honesty, faithfulness and I am able to trust my woman, my morals are good and I'm serious about finding true love and happiness.
